title: Your Personalized Recommendations

intro: Here are 3 key recommendations to optimize your Lightning node and maximize your earnings. For unlimited access to all our analyses and features, consider our yearly subscription.

recommendations.title: Fee Optimization
recommendations.description: Our analysis shows you could increase your earnings by 15-20% by adjusting your routing fees based on market conditions.
recommendations.details: Your node's current fees are slightly suboptimal compared to market conditions. We recommend increasing base fees by 10% and adjusting variable fees based on transaction volume.

recommendations.title: Channel Expansion
recommendations.description: Your node has significant expansion potential. We've identified 3 strategic nodes for new channels.
recommendations.details: Network analysis shows you could benefit from channels with high-activity but low-connectivity nodes. These connections could generate significant routing traffic.

recommendations.title: Liquidity Management
recommendations.description: Your node shows a liquidity imbalance that limits its efficiency. We propose a rebalancing strategy.
recommendations.details: Liquidity is concentrated on certain channels, creating bottlenecks. Periodic rebalancing could significantly improve routing performance.
